items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Liqui-Tape is our most flexible liquid adhesive for wearers.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Walker Tape®’s Liqui-Tape is our most flexible liquid adhesive for wearers. It is a silicone-based, skin safe daily wear (1-7 days) Liqui-Tape gives wearers a comfortable, natural wear experience.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
Use in a well-ventilated area.
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.storedescription: Use as a touchup if the hair system lifts. Apply to skin or base and blow dry until very tacky. Press the hair system onto the skin and hold firmly for 10 seconds. We recommend performing a patch test before use.
items.pagetitle: Liqui-Tape - 1.4 fl oz, Brush-On | Walker Tape
